title: What to Watch: The 18 Best New Movies and TV Shows From February
sub_head: The stories behind Uber, a high-society scammer, a notorious ’90s sex tape and more
body:
Here’s a roundup of the month’s most noteworthy movies and TV shows, as covered by The Wall Street Journal’s critics.
Alan Ritchson plays the hero of the Lee Child novels in Amazon’s eight-part series
